Add Drop Down Menu - Changing Chart Type
```{r}
library(MASS)
library(plotly)
covmat <- matrix(c(0.8, 0.4, 0.3, 0.8), nrow = 2, byrow = T)
df <- mvrnorm(n = 10000, c(0,0), Sigma = covmat)
df <- as.data.frame(df)

colnames(df) <- c("x", "y")
p <- plot_ly(df, x = ~x, y = ~y) %>%
  add_markers(marker = list(opacity = 0.3, line = list(color = "black", width = 1)))

p <- p %>% layout(
  title = "SCIENTIFIC VISUALIZATIONyo",
  xaxis = list(domain = c(0.1, 1)),
  yaxis = list(title = "y"),
  updatemenus = list(
    list(
      y = 0.8,
      buttons = list(

        list(method = "restyle",
             args = list("type", "scatter"),
             label = "Scatter"),

        list(method = "restyle",
             args = list("type", "histogram2d"),
             label = "2D Histogram")))
  ))

p

```
